function_call.name: classify_mitigation
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_mitigations":[{"name":"Conduct more focused research on the impact of covid-19 on the built environment and its implications for preventive measures","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improvement of health infrastructure and health-supporting infrastructure","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Use of alternative ventilation strategies in rooms where ceiling fans inhibit vertical mixing; consideration of virus-laden particle movement in ventilation design","category":"Natural ventilation increase","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Continuous operation of toilet ventilation systems to minimize transmission risk","category":"Maintenance / decontamination of building water sytems","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vaccination campaigns, travel restrictions, public health measures, and economic support","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular testing and strict adherence to distancing measures","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implement urban regeneration initiatives, incentivize the use of vacant spaces, support local businesses and entrepreneurship.","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Rapid expansion of healthcare infrastructure, real-time monitoring of bed availability, and strategic deployment of medical equipment","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement effective air cleaning, filtration, and ventilation systems to block virus entry pathways and maintain healthy workplace environment","category":"Use of smart/innovative air quality controls technology","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Improvement of existing ventilation systems, prevention of indoor air recirculation","category":"Air filtration","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Resilient agricultural practices","category":"Greener","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Regular coordination meetings, clear communication channels, and training on crisis response","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Implementing appropriate social distancing measures, regular disinfection of public facilities, and promoting outdoor activities that minimize close contact.","category":"Social distancing","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of multiple data sources and factors to assess virus transmission, not solely relying on temperature and humidity.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Develop and disseminate comprehensive resources on the interaction between hiv and tuberculosis, improve access to information through multilingual platforms","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Active transportation infrastructure","category":"Outdoor spaces","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Implement strict health and safety measures in green buildings, and analyze the impact of housing policies on covid-19 transmission","category":"Monitoring and control indoor air quality","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Developing and implementing proper distribution models, embracing technology-driven distribution strategies","category":"Minimize supply chain disruptions","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Face masking","category":"Ensure use of personal protection equipment","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Monitor reactions and performance, alter assignments and schedules, offer psychosocial support as needed","category":"Quarantine support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Conducting public health campaigns, providing educational materials and resources, promoting accurate information.","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Regular checking and closing of the toilet lid while flushing","category":"Greywater management","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Integrate public health experts and epidemiologists into the study of historical developments to assess and address disease propagation risks.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Provide training and support for stakeholders in data analysis and interpretation","category":"Staff training / upskilling","confidence":"Low"},{"name":"Extend the system to cover longitudinal aspects of human behaviors at an architectural scale","category":"Occupancy control (eg separating at/risk contaminated population)","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Implement targeted social media campaigns, provide clear signage and instructions at park entrances","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Support and funding for small businesses to transition to online platforms, and assistance with digital marketing","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Use multiple forecast models and provide uncertainty ranges, communicate limitations of the model.","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Provide contextual explanation of the equations and their application in the specific domain","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Perceived usefulness","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Standardization of intervention strategies, clear communication, and coordination among health authorities","category":"Facilitate transparent communication","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Engage experienced science librarian to check search strategy, use electronic search strategy checklist","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Incorporate green spaces, such as parks and green roofs, into urban planning and development projects","category":"Greenery","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Improving housing quality, implementing mosquito control methods, and creating mosquito-proof environments","category":"Animal vectors control","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Provide education and awareness programs to address impulsivity and promote compliance with rules and regulations","category":"Raising awareness","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Conducting evidence-based studies to understand the relationship between occupant schedules and productivity, avoiding unwarranted assumptions","category":"Support recovery of sectors via remote work","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Equitable access to health and safety resources, fair labor practices, and support for vulnerable support","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Closure of small businesses, restaurants, cinemas, theatres, bars, pubs, and clubs","category":"Absorb surge in service tracking / monitoring","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Integration of gis and gps applications","category":"Infection tracking / monitoring","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Mental health support
